# thunder_hd_monitor (Resource)

`thunder_hd_monitor`: Enable HD monitoring

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_hd_monitor" "thunder_hd_monitor" {
  enable = 0
}
```
